price: 18. Mpe ye nde mokonzi likolo ya bawumbu naye, mpe azali na bwanya atonda ba nsango.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
